TopicTitle: Can't see other planets from Kerbin

Articles.Content: Hello i've been playing ksp since .18 and just now noticed how we can't see other planets from kerbin any one else notice this. I don't know why we can't maybe feature to add in future?
You can but you need to go into IVA mode and look in the right place

You can but you need to go into IVA mode and look in the right place
Yes i know you can do that but im talking about actually seeing the planets in the sky having light reflect off of them. Kind of when you look at venus.

Venus, which just looks like an extra bright star. Same as all the others.

Unless of course you use a telescope or powerful binoculars.

for example you can see Jupiter or Mras as a bright star at night. In KSP there are invisible.

Also you can see the ISS or satellites as tiny movin ponits.

I think that will increase the game's "atmosphere"
